name: analog-film-library
title: Analog Film Library
description: Browse analog films by name, brand, ISO, process, and more
author: samuelkraft

commands.name: search-analog-films
commands.title: Search Analog Films
commands.description: Search for analog films by name, brand, ISO, process, and more

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
